p: Treatment differences in DSN in Cycle 1 were analyzed using confidence intervals (CIs) calculated based upon 10,000 bootstrap samples stratified by baseline weight (<65 kg, ≥65 kg and ≤75 kg, or >75 kg). Two‐sided 95% CIs for the difference in mean DSN between each Rolontis group and the pegfilgrastim group were calculated. Noninferiority was demonstrated if the upper limit of the two‐sided 95% CI was <1 day. Two types of P‐values were reported: The noninferiority P‐value was calculated as two times the proportion of treatment difference >1 in the resampling, and the superiority P‐value was calculated as two times the proportion of treatment difference >0 in the resampling.
